attributes.name: element
attributes.description: Whether to use an <button> or <a> element to create the button. In most cases you will not need to set this as it will be configured automatically if you use href

attributes.name: color
attributes.description: Alternative colours of the button. secondary or reverse

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Whether the button should be disabled. For button and input elements, disabled and aria-disabled attributes will be set automatically.

attributes.name: href
attributes.description: The URL that the button should link to. If this is set, element will be automatically set to <a> if it has not already been defined.
